values: 节约；节省；攒（钱）；储蓄；储存；保留；保存；救；拯救；挽救；收集；收藏；避免；免除；使免遭；[法律]保全（权利或财产）；[计算机]存档；[体]救球
救球；扑救（尤指守门员在足球等运动中阻止对方得分）

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 安全; 健康; 储存

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 节约的；挽救的；补偿的；保留的
救助者；节俭的人；节约装置

word_mean_info__list.difference: 较正式用词，指小心地使用难以补充的资源或贵重物，免遭浪费或毁坏，以备不时之需。
普通用词，指将物品存放，以备将来使用。
普通用词，指尽量少用，以争取数量上有所增加。
侧重将物品完好无损地保存下来。
含义广泛，既可指营救某人使脱离危险，也可指精神或道德上的拯救。
多指营救某人脱离紧迫的危险。

word_group.brief_definition: 省钱；节约金钱；节省金钱
省时间；节省时间；节约时间
救场；解决问题；排除灾难
救场；解决问题；排除灾难
使某人保全面子；使某人不至丢脸

bilingual.target: 节约用水就是拯救生命。
你也可以帮助拯救他人。
我们正在努力拯救地球！
我们应该帮助拯救鲨鱼。
我们正在努力拯救地球。

bilingual.source: It was time to save the penguins.
bilingual.target: 是时候拯救这些企鹅了。

bilingual.source: Design a poster to save the animal.
bilingual.target: 设计一个拯救动物的海报。

bilingual.source: We want to save animals in danger.
bilingual.target: 我们想拯救处于危险中的动物。

bilingual.source: People needed to make big changes to save it.
bilingual.target: 人们需要做出重大改变来拯救它。

bilingual.source: The WWF is working hard to save them all.
bilingual.target: 世界自然基金会正在努力拯救所有动物。

list.abstract: 及物动词 1.vt救，挽救[(+from)] He saved me from drowning.他救了我，使我免遭溺死。The doctor saved the child's life.这位医生挽救了孩子的生命。 2.节省，省去；避免[O1][(+from)]

yingyinNormal.en: It would save the city, it would save the people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样就可以会拯救城市，拯救人民。

yingyinNormal.en: You have power yet to save your people, Sidao.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还有能力拯救你的人民，贾似道。

yingyinNormal.en: Ready to make the ultimate sacrifice to save your species.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了拯救种族不惜慷慨牺牲!

yingyinNormal.en: What's the plan? We save the Machine by storing it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有什么计划？我们把机器储存起来，拯救它。

yingyinNormal.en: Trust in your friends. Together, you can save this world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 相信你的朋友，团结一致，你可以拯救这个世界。

yingyinNormal.en: To save the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 选她去拯救世界。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. It's different. But you say you want to save jazz. How are you gonna save jazz if no one's listening?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道。这风格迥异。你说你想拯救爵士。如果没人听爵士你拿什么来拯救它？

yingyinNormal.en: We're not meant to save the world. We're meant to leave it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不是要拯救这个世界，而是要离开它。

yingyinNormal.en: Now you need to tell me what your plan is to save the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在告诉我，你们拯救世界的计划是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't even think we're gonna be able to save ourselves, buddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得我们都不能拯救我们自己了，兄弟。

yingyinNormal.en: I've grown very fond of them and now I would save them if I can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经喜欢上了他们，现在我想尽我的力量拯救他们。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: You mean we're not gonna get the crown, save the town. And Mr. Krabs?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说我们不能拿到皇冠，拯救城市和克莱伯先生了？

yingyinNormal.en: But to be inspirational, you don't have to save lives or win medals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做到鼓舞人心，不一定是要去拯救生命，抑或赢得奖牌。

yingyinNormal.en: I, on the other hand, am the hero who is going to save Arendelle from destruction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而我则是将安瑞戴尔从毁灭中拯救出来的英雄。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, let us hope that Mr. Potter will always be around to save the day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，让我们期待波特同学能永远在这里拯救所有的人。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Our job is not to save one passenger convoy, it is to win the war.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的使命并不是拯救一艘船上的生命，而是要赢得战争的胜利。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey! What happened? Why are we all here? To make a stand. To save football.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是怎么了？我们怎么在这儿？我们是来反击的，来拯救足球的。

yingyinNormal.en: Here we all are back on earth with nothing but our wit, and our will, to save the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我们重新开始脚踏实地，只有用我们的智慧和意志，去拯救世界。

yingyinNormal.en: These animals can replace thousands of boots on the ground. How many lives would that save?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种动物在地面上可以代替成千上万个机器人，这将会拯救多少生命？

yingyinNormal.en: I am not leaving here until we find some other act of true love to save you. Do you happen to have any ideas?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在找到能拯救你的真爱之前我是不会离你而去的。你有主意了吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: [体育]救球; 阻止对方得分

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 省钱；节约金钱；节省金钱
省时间；节省时间；节约时间

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 节约；节省；储蓄金；存款；保留；例外
vt. 解救；储蓄；保存；节省；（save的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: v. 救助；搭救；挽救；积攒；储蓄；节省；阻止对方得；阻止对方赢得；保存；减少

sense_info_list.en: keep from being spent, wasted, or lost

examination_example.sentence: Energy companies can use AI to help customers reduce their electricity bills, <highlight>saving</highlight> them money while helping the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能源公司可以使用人工智能来帮助客户减少电费，在帮助环境的同时为他们省钱。

examination_example.sentence: That common-sense change enjoys wide public support and would <highlight>save</highlight> the USPS $2 billion per year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种常识性的改变得到了广泛的公众支持，每年将为美国邮政署节省20亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: Taking a gap year to figure things out initially can help prevent stress and <highlight>save</highlight> money later on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用间隔年一开始就把事情弄清楚可以帮助预防压力，还能为以后省钱。

sense_info_list.en: free or keep from danger, harm, or ruin

examination_example.sentence: It is not enough to say that the algorithms DeepMind develops will benefit patients and <highlight>save</highlight> lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅说DeepMind开发的算法将有益于患者和挽救生命是不够的。

examination_example.sentence: Software promises to <highlight>save</highlight> lives on the scale that drugs now can.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 软件有望像现在药物所能达到的那样拯救生命。

examination_example.sentence: The community mental health team <highlight>saved</highlight> my life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社区心理健康团队救了我一命。

sense_info_list.en: keep and store up something for future use, especially money

examination_example.sentence: Legislation is moving through the House that would <highlight>save</highlight> USPS an estimated $28.6 billion over five years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众议院正在通过一项法案，预计五年内将为美国邮政署节省大约286亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: Now most colleges, <highlight>save</highlight> for many selective campuses, allow all undergraduates, and even graduate students, to get their low grades forgiven.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在大多数大学，除了许多精英学校，允许所有本科生，甚至研究生的低分都能得到原谅。

sense_info_list.en: the money one has saved, especially through a bank or official scheme
to avoid doing sth difficult or unpleasant
prevent an opponent from scoring a goal or point in a game or from winning the game
sense_info_list.zh: [体育]救球; 阻止对方得分

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 安全; 健康; 储存

word_usage.usage: 表达“拯救某人以避免……”可以说save sb. from sth.或save sb. from doing sth.。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 储蓄者；存款人；能起节约功效的物品；比正常价格低的旅费；折扣价；两面下注
n. 节约；节省；储蓄金；存款；保留；例外

word_family.mean: v. 救助；搭救；挽救；积攒；储蓄；节省；阻止对方得；阻止对方赢得；保存；减少

sense_info_list.en: free or keep from danger, harm, or ruin

examination_example.sentence: The culture minister, Franck Riester, said religious relics <highlight>saved</highlight> from the cathedral were being securely held at the Hôtel de Ville.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文化部长Franck Riester表示，从大教堂救出的宗教文物正被妥善安置在巴黎市政厅。

examination_example.sentence: "They <highlight>saved</highlight> the main structure, but it all came down to 15-30 minutes," Nunez said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “他们保留了主要结构，但最终只剩下15-30分钟，”努内斯说。

examination_example.sentence: After the blaze was declared completely extinguished, 15 hours after it started, the junior interior minister said the structure had been <highlight>saved</highlight> but remained vulnerable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大火持续了15小时后被完全扑灭，初级内政部长表示该建筑得以幸存，但仍然岌岌可危。

sense_info_list.en: keep from being spent, wasted, or lost

examination_example.sentence: Once purchased and trained, this would allow the casual user to <highlight>save</highlight> money and time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦购买和培训(该机器人)，这将使休闲用户节省金钱和时间。

sense_info_list.en: keep data by moving a copy to a storage location, especially from memory
keep and store up something for future use, especially money

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 安全; 健康; 储存

word_usage.usage:
save作动词，表“救”；“节约”，为及物动词。
示例：We should try to save water.
我们应设法节水。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 节约；节省；储蓄金；存款；保留；例外

word_family.mean: v. 救助；搭救；挽救；积攒；储蓄；节省；阻止对方得；阻止对方赢得；保存；减少

sense_info_list.en: keep from being spent; wasted; or lost

examination_example.sentence: Four panels on one side of that roof could <highlight>save</highlight> a family of four around $ 300 a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 屋顶一侧的四个面板每年可以为一个四口之家节省约 300 美元。

examination_example.sentence: They can <highlight>save</highlight> a lot more time and trouble.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以省去更多的时间和麻烦。

examination_example.sentence: Its digital course materials <highlight>save</highlight> students up to 60% compared to traditional printed textbooks, the company added.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司补充说，与传统的印刷教科书相比，其数字课程材料为学生节省了高达60%的费用。

sense_info_list.en: keep and store up something for future use; especially money

examination_example.sentence: And to <highlight>save</highlight> money and still eat well you don't need local, organic ingredients; all you need is real food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了既省钱又吃得好，你不需要当地的有机食材；你需要的只是真正的食物。

examination_example.sentence: To eat well and still <highlight>save</highlight> money, people should buy fresh food and cook it themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了吃得好又能省钱，人们应该买新鲜的食物自己煮。

examination_example.sentence: Unless people are prepared to <highlight>save</highlight> a lot more, our calculations suggest that if you are now in your mid-40s, then you are likely to work until your early 70s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非人们准备存更多的钱，否则，据我们计算，如果你现在45岁上下，那么你很可能会工作到70岁出头。

sense_info_list.en: free or keep from danger; harm; or ruin

examination_example.sentence: As driver less cars improve, they will <highlight>save</highlight> lives. They will make fewer mistakes than human drivers do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着无人驾驶汽车的改进，它们将挽救生命。与人类驾驶员相比，他们犯的错误更少。

examination_example.sentence: The cost for <highlight>saving</highlight> our civilization would be considerably less than the world's current military spending.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拯救我们文明的成本将大大低于世界目前的军队费用开支。

examination_example.sentence: Yet the cost we project for <highlight>saving</highlight> civilization would amount to less than $200 billion a year, 1∕6 of current global military spending.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，我们预计拯救文明的成本每年不到2000亿美元，是目前全球军队费用开支的1∕6。

sense_info_list.en: keep data by moving a copy to a storage location; especially from memory

examination_example.sentence: Every now and then, I'd <highlight>save</highlight> a picture I liked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时不时地，我会保存一张我喜欢的照片。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 安全; 健康; 储存

word_usage.usage:
save作动词，表“救”；“节约”，为及物动词。
示例：We should try to save water.
我们应设法节水。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 节约；节省；储蓄金；存款；保留；例外

word_family.mean: v. 救助；搭救；挽救；积攒；储蓄；节省；阻止对方得；阻止对方赢得；保存；减少

examination_example.sentence: Ten minutes spent in this way could <highlight>save</highlight> you quite a lot of time in the long run.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从长远来看，用这种方式花十分钟可以为你节省很多时间。

examination_example.sentence: He tried to <highlight>save</highlight> water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他试图节约用水。

examination_example.sentence: We all need to get involved in <highlight>saving</highlight> energy whether it's at work, at home, or at school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是在工作中，在家里，还是在学校，我们都需要参与到节能中来。

examination_example.sentence: To many people, <highlight>saving</highlight> lives is part of the job but styling hair is an extra and should be rewarded.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对许多人来说，拯救生命是工作的一部分，但设计发型是额外的，应该得到酬谢。

examination_example.sentence: You <highlight>saved</highlight> my life!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你救了我的命！

examination_example.sentence: His efforts most likely <highlight>saved</highlight> the woman's life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的努力很可能救了那个女人的命。

examination_example.sentence: David, have you <highlight>saved</highlight> enough for the car?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫，你存够买车的钱了吗？

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 安全; 健康; 储存

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 储蓄者；存款人；能起节约功效的物品；比正常价格低的旅费；折扣价；两面下注
n. 节约；节省；储蓄金；存款；保留；例外
vt. 解救；储蓄；保存；节省；（save的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: v. 救助；搭救；挽救；积攒；储蓄；节省；阻止对方得；阻止对方赢得；保存；减少

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 省钱；节约金钱；节省金钱
省时间；节省时间；节约时间

sense_info_list.en: free or keep from danger, harm, or ruin

examination_example.sentence: The tree was so big and beautiful that even more and more people wanted to <highlight>save</highlight> that forest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这棵树又大又漂亮，以至于越来越多的人想要拯救那片森林。

examination_example.sentence: The doctors and nurses managed to <highlight>save</highlight> the lives of patients, though they didn't have enough medicine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生和护士设法挽救了病人的生命，尽管他们没有足够的药物。

examination_example.sentence: There are many things you can do to <highlight>save</highlight> the earth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以做很多事情来拯救地球。

sense_info_list.en: keep from being spent, wasted, or lost

examination_example.sentence: This can <highlight>save</highlight> some oil and produce less CO2.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样可以节省一些石油和产生更少的二氧化碳。

examination_example.sentence: But during busy travel time, some parents take their children out of school early to <highlight>save</highlight> money on vacations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是在繁忙的旅行时间，一些父母会提前带孩子离开学校，以节省假期费用。

examination_example.sentence: However, in 2006 the company stopped producing these robotic pets in order to <highlight>save</highlight> money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，该公司为了省钱，在2006年停止生产这些机器人宠物。

sense_info_list.en: keep and store up something for future use, especially money

examination_example.sentence: Children can choose to <highlight>save</highlight> their money or spend it using a card.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们可以选择存钱或者用信用卡消费。

examination_example.sentence: They may help parents <highlight>save</highlight> their children's money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以帮助父母节省孩子的钱。

examination_example.sentence: So he always <highlight>saved</highlight> money by repairing bikes to help them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以他总是通过修理自行车来帮助他们省钱。

examination_example.sentence: Keeping family recipes is <highlight>saving</highlight> and honoring our tradition so that future generations can continue to make family ties stronger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保留家庭食谱是在保存和尊重我们的传统，这样子孙后代就能够继续加强家庭纽带。

examination_example.sentence: But they should <highlight>save</highlight> their writing in time on the computer because it may stop working suddenly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是他们应该在电脑上及时保存他们写的东西，因为它可能会突然停止工作。

examination_example.sentence: You should <highlight>save</highlight> them and give them to your teacher, your family, or the police.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该把它们保存起来，交给你的老师、家人或警察。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 安全; 健康; 储存
